Description:
Detects process handle on LSASS process with certain access mask

Author: Roberto Rodriguez, Teymur Kheirkhabarov, Dimitrios Slamaris, Mark Russinovich, Aleksey Potapov, oscd.community (update)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Suspicious AccessMask Requested From LSASS
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where (((eventid = '4656' and objectname like '%\lsass.exe' and (accessmask like '%0x40%' or accessmask like '%0x1400%' or accessmask like '%0x100000%' or accessmask like '%0x1410%' or accessmask like '%0x1010%' or accessmask like '%0x1438%' or accessmask like '%0x143a%' or accessmask like '%0x1418%' or accessmask like '%0x1f0fff%' or accessmask like '%0x1f1fff%' or accessmask like '%0x1f2fff%' or accessmask like '%0x1f3fff%')) or (eventid = '4663' and objectname like '%\lsass.exe' and (accesslist like '%4484%' or accesslist like '%4416%'))) and  not (processname like '%:\program files%' or (processname like '%\x64\scenarioengine.exe' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or (processname like '%:\windows\temp\%' and processname like '%\avira_speedup_setup_update.tmp' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or (processname like '%:\windows\system32\snmp.exe' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or (processname like '%:\windows\systemtemp\%' and processname like '%\googleupdate.exe' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or ((processname like '%\csrss.exe' or processname like '%\gamingservices.exe' or processname like '%\lsm.exe' or processname like '%\microsoftedgeupdate.exe' or processname like '%\minionhost.exe' or processname like '%\mrt.exe' or processname like '%\msmpeng.exe' or processname like '%\perfmon.exe' or processname like '%\procexp.exe' or processname like '%\procexp64.exe' or processname like '%\svchost.exe' or processname like '%\taskmgr.exe' or processname like '%\thor.exe' or processname like '%\thor64.exe' or processname like '%\vmtoolsd.exe' or processname like '%\vstskmgr.exe' or processname like '%\wininit.exe' or processname like '%\wmiprvse.exe' or processname like '%rtkauduservice64') and (processname like '%:\program files (x86)\%' or processname like '%:\program files\%' or processname like '%:\programdata\microsoft\windows defender\platform\%' or processname like '%:\windows\sysnative\%' or processname like '%:\windows\system32\%' or processname like '%:\windows\syswow64\%' or processname like '%:\windows\temp\asgard2-agent\%')) or (processname like '%:\windows\system32\taskhostw.exe' or processname like '%:\windows\system32\msiexec.exe' or processname like '%:\windows\ccm\ccmexec.exe') or (processname like '%:\windows\sysmon64.exe' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or (processname like '%:\windows\temp\asgard2-agent-sc\aurora\%' and processname like '%\aurora-agent-64.exe' and accesslist like '%%%4484%') or ((processname like '%:\users\%' and processname like '%\appdata\local\temp\is-%') and processname like '%\avira_system_speedup.tmp' and accesslist like '%%%4484%')) and  not ((processname like '%\procmon64.exe' or processname like '%\procmon.exe') and accesslist like '%%%4484%'))
